IX.iii.1.E.7.n
.
Example 4:  Counting Income During the Initial Year
Example
:  The Veteran died on July 19, 2014.  The surviving spouse files a Survivors Pension claim on August 2, 2014.  The surviving spouse reports the following one-time income:
$500 received on June 30, 2014
$500 received on July 17, 2014, and
$500 received on July 29, 2014.
Result
:  Disregard the $500 received on June 30, 2014, since it was received before the effective date (July 1, 2014).  Disregard the $500 received on July 17, 2014, because it was received before the Veteran’s death (although after the effective date).  Pay based on the IVAP of $500 from August 1, 2014.  Reduce the IVAP to $0 effective August 1, 2015.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section E - Pension - Basic Rate Determinations
